title: Retry deployment after failed deploy

requirements.text: Re-run the full build and deployment process for the current application revision (frontend + backend) and ensure it completes successfully.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build is triggered for the current code revision.
The deployment finishes successfully and the app is reachable after deploy.

requirements.text: If deployment fails again, capture and surface the complete deployment error output (including the failing step and stack/error message) so it can be addressed in a follow-up change.
acceptanceCriteria: On failure, the deploy output clearly indicates which step failed and includes the full error message (not truncated).
The reported error is sufficient for a developer to reproduce or pinpoint the cause (e.g., build step name, command, and error text).

constraints: Do not introduce product/feature changes unrelated to deployment retry.
nonGoals: Adding new website features or changing existing CMS/admin behavior as part of this request.
